price: Und dein Herr hätte die Städte nimmer zu Unrecht vernichtet, während ihre Bewohner Heilstifter waren.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna rabbuka liyuh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā muṣ'liḥūna
